title: Paul Merton in China
overview: Comedian Paul Merton ventures into the unknown as he embarks upon a six-week tour of China. Paul's trip will take in the major cities of China, as well some of the most breathtaking countryside and remote backwaters that this vast country has to offer. In his own inimitable style, Paul will attempt to unravel the deep mysteries and baffling contradictions of this ancient country.
